channel.title: ::Command help
channel.description:
Before I get my server up and running (which I'm in need of help, read my "Need help getting server up and running post") I want to know how to put in ::commands for both Admin-Only and Admin&Player
I wanna put in the basic admin only commands:
- goup - godown - noclip - pickup - emote - pnpc - tele x y
an some commands for everyone - barrows (gives u every barrows item to sell or keep) - leet (gives u a set of the best armour and weapon) - yell
etc.
Please tell me what file I have to edit to put in commands, how to make them admin only, or for everyone and how to edit what will happen when the command is entered.

item.title: ::Command help
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

The only thing of that that I understood was Admin Only.

You didn’t even tell me which file to edit.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Command help
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_X Phaze X
item.description:
@Phaze_X wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Moooo”) <- Normal command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Moooo”) && playerRights >= 2) <- Admin only command

Read full topic
